doc:
Justin Theroux https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Justin_Theroux 0 Justin Paul Theroux (; born August 10, 1971) is an American actor, comedian, film producer and screenwriter. He is known for his work with film director David Lynch in Mulholland Drive (2001) and Inland Empire (2006), his starring role as Kevin Garvey in the HBO series The Leftovers (2014–2017) and as Tom in The Girl on the Train (2016). He is also known as a screenwriter for films such as Tropic Thunder (2008) and Iron Man 2 (2010). Justin_Paul_Theroux ( ; born August_10 , 1971 ) is an_American_actor , comedian , film_producer_and_screenwriter . He is_known for his_work with film_director_David_Lynch in Mulholland_Drive_(_2001_) and Inland_Empire_(_2006_) , his_starring_role as Kevin_Garvey in the_HBO_series The_Leftovers_(_2014 – 2017_) and as Tom in The_Girl on the_Train_(_2016_) . He is_also_known as a_screenwriter for films such_as Tropic_Thunder_(_2008_)_and_Iron_Man 2_(_2010_) .
